name: Cops and Robbers 4
description:
Cops and Robbers 4

Fun two player chasing game, as the robber you have to collect the diamonds, as the cop you have to catch the robber before they collect all the diamonds!

Controls:

Cop

Left: S

Right: F

Jump: E

Robber

Left: left arrow

Right right arrow

Jump: up arrow

Reset: Z

visit pico-8 forums for cart info
